positive_examples: This is an example of opening mouth.
The opening mouth demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed opening mouth in this context.
A typical case of opening mouth would involve these features.
The concept of opening mouth applies here.
The mechanical motion of separating the jaws to create an oral opening.
negative_examples: This is an example of opening eyes, not opening mouth.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: OpeningEyes, or other types of Opening

definition: The action of separating the lips and jaw to create an oral aperture.
